item.description:
I ate at Brix a couple of years ago - it was very good. Hope the place is still delicious! They do have a $20.10 special but it is quite limited. It will be very nice to see everyone again. Here is their website http://www.brixct.com...

I will be there - not cancelling due to weather. If you can not make it due to the weather please call me (860) 922-0611.

I will collect $1.00 from attendees toward Meetup expenses. I expect ALL "Yes" replies to show up!

So, come and help me blow my diet with the good food at Brix.

- Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: BRIX RESTAURANT 02/24/10 7:00PM
